name: Rimebiter Bathysmal Vishap
description:
A vishap that dwells deep beneath the oceans. Due to certain social adaptations, it has manifested a form aligned with the Cryo element.
The coming of humans sparked a conflict and a resultant evolution within the Bathysmal Vishaps, just as ants might divide up labor and biological characteristics, thus appearing in different forms. These vishaps are stronger than their ordinary kin.

investigation.name: Bathysmal Vishap Herd
investigation.description: A powerful group of Bathysmal Vishaps.\nThey have been specifically bred and selected by the people of Enkanomiya, which has given them their exceptional strength. Of course, no vishap would consider this some sort of debt to be repaid.\nThe strongest members of this herd can use different elements, which they wield as a show of their hatred.
investigation.lockdesc: In the ocean depths they await â€” yes, they await their moment to hunt...
